document_data.name: Tabaxi Shaman
document_data.alignment2e: {{Alignment grid| on  | off  | off | on | off | off | on  | off | off }}
document_data.mainbody: '''Tabaxi shamans''', or '''spiritlords''' as they were also called, were [[specialty priest]]s devoted to [[Ubtao]], the Father of the Dinosaurs within the [[Chultan pantheon]].
document_data.Activities: Spiritlords protected their tribe from offending ancient [[spirit]]s or [[elemental]] creatures.
document_data.Abilities: They carved a special mask that served as the home of the very first spirit called. Their spirit could cast several [[spell]]s selected by the spiritlord on their behalf. Having their spirit mask in close proximity made it more difficult for the spiritlord to be surprised.
document_data.Possessions: Tabaxi shamans wielded [[club]]s, [[spear]]s, ''[[kerrie]]s'', and ''[[yklwa]]s''. They usually wore [[Hide armor|dinosaur hide armor]] and carried a ''[[hlang]]''.
